short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform JS .env variables to Azure .env variables

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moving your JavaScript environment variables to Azure Function app is a hassle. You can paste your environment variables in this app and transform it to the correct format in just one click.

Reduce copy and paste errors and saves you development time.
